pageContent: Purpose: The aim of this study was to conduct a prospective, single-institutional comparison for primary whole-gland cryoablation and high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) in localized prostate cancer with respect to oncological and functional outcomes.

metaData.source:
Thermal-based treatment options for localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16107241/
